meanings.sent1: She is the ditsiest person I know, always forgetting where she put her keys.
meanings.sent2: The ditsiest student in class often loses focus during lectures.
meanings.sent3: In a ditsiest moment, she tried to unlock the door with her car remote.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a ditsiest butterfly, flitting from one thought to another.
meanings.sent5: The ditsiest puppy at the park chased after every falling leaf.

meanings.definition: Showing a lack of common sense or intelligence
meanings.sent1: His ditsiest decision was to wear shorts in the snow.
meanings.sent2: The ditsiest choice she made was to trust a stranger with her savings.
meanings.sent3: In a ditsiest move, he tried to use a fork to eat soup.
meanings.sent4: Her idea to swim with sharks was the ditsiest thing she had ever done.
meanings.sent5: The ditsiest character in the story always made the wrong choices.

meanings.definition: Silly or frivolous in behavior or appearance
meanings.sent1: The ditsiest outfit she wore had polka dots and stripes together.
meanings.sent2: His ditsiest jokes always made everyone laugh at the party.
meanings.sent3: In a ditsiest moment, she danced with a mop as her partner.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as ditsiest as a group of giggling school children.
meanings.sent5: The ditsiest hat at the event had a giant feather sticking out.
